rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall aligned with Vastu principles to receive positive energy.
Scandinavian design open-plan kitchen and living area integrated for a family of four. Includes minimalistic cabinetry, natural lighting and functional layout.
Spacious master bedroom designed for a family of four with privacy and natural light.
Additional guest bedroom in Scandinavian minimalist style.
Master bathroom with en-suite features and Vastu-aligned water elements.

openings.description: Sturdy Scandinavian style door with reinforced frame for security.
Dedicated opening connecting the two-car garage to the villa, following local building norms and Vastu guidelines on access points.

garage.description: Modern two-car garage with Scandinavian design elements that integrates into the overall villa plan. Positioned at a corner plot to maximize garden exposure.

garden.description: Expansive garden area designed in Scandinavian style, featuring native plants and minimalistic landscaping to enhance natural beauty and relaxation space.
